name: Super-Electromagnetic Voltech Wyvern
text:
(This card is always treated as a "Batteryman" card.)
If you control a Level 5 or higher "Batteryman" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn, you can Tribute 1 other Thunder monster you control; change all monsters your opponent controls to Attack Position, also change their ATK to 0, and if you do, their effects are negated until the end of this turn.
